About me

I am a Programmer

For the front-end I usually work with Javascript, either standalone or including popular frameworks like ReactJS. I also make the web pretty by using Sass, CSS and, whenever needed, Bootstrap, Materialize css etc.

I am a Designer

I feel comfortable working with many Adobe products. Photoshop, Illustrator, Xd are some kind of industry standards and I love working with them. I'm not limited to them, though:Inkscape or Figma are also very valid applications that I've been working with.

My Projects

Weather App

A simple weather app that presents the users with the current local weather for their location. Built with Javascript for the frontend, and NodeJS, Express and Axios for the backend.

Task list React App

A 'To-do' application created to store everyday tasks. Built with React JS using React Hooks and the Context API.
